paymentMethods.label: PayPal
paymentMethods.instructions:
Pay via PayPal

Send {{price}} through 'Friends and Family' to PayPal account callanspappy@yahoo.com.

We will reply to confirm receipt of payment after we receive it (usually within 24 hours). Thanks for your patronage!

paymentMethods.label: Ecuadorian Bank Transfer

paymentMethods.label: Flex Ticket Reservation
paymentMethods.instructions:
Your Flex Ticket reservation(s) have been submitted.

We will confirm your reservation within 24 hours. Thanks for being a loyal patron!
